changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table booking ( booking_id serial primary key, number_of_people text, number_of_people2 text, record_time date, record_date_day varchar(100), record_date_from varchar(100), record_date_to varchar(100), table_type varchar(100), phone_number varchar(100), person_id varchar(100), name varchar(200), surname varchar(200), foreign key(person_id) references person(id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table order_status ( order_status_id serial primary key, oorder_id int, order_item_id int, update_date date, status varchar(100), foreign key(order_item_id) references order_items(order_item_id), foreign key(oorder_id) references oorder(oorder_id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table restaurant_table( id serial, name varchar(100), status int, person_number int, primary key(id, name) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table comments( id serial, messages text, person_id varchar(100), item_id int, anonym boolean DEFAULT false, date timestamp, primary key(id), foreign key(person_id) references person(id), foreign key(item_id) references item(item_id) )

changeSet.author: pompei
changeSet.sql: create table comments_like( id serial, person_id varchar(200), comments_id int, liked int, disliked int, primary key(person_id,comments_id), foreign key(person_id) references person(id), foreign key(comments_id) references comments(id) )
